reference.shortdesc: The synnoteref element references a syntax note element (synnote) that has already been defined elsewhere in the syntax diagram. The same notation can be used in more than one syntax definition.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , and the attribute defined below.

dlentry.dd: A reference to the target syntax note (synnote) element. The referenced syntax note must be in the same syntax diagram as the synnoteref element. See for detailed information on supported values and processing implications. For this element, processors should assume the equivalent of scope="local" and format="dita".
